headline.main: Capture of 'Bloody Ridge' in Sicily Like Victory of Hill 609 in Tunisia; American Troops Storm Height Three Times Before Germans Are Beaten -- Feats of Heroism Mark Each Onslaught

lead_paragraph: WITH THE UNITED STATES INFANTRY, Sicily, July 30 (Delayed) -- The capture of "Bloody Ridge," an almost perpendicular hill mass barring the American advance along the northern coast toward the mountain village of San Stefano di Camastra, was an epic battle of the brief Sicilian campaign.
abstract: US capture of mt village of San Stefano di Camastra, Sicily, described
